zh.title: Half Sword：沉浸式中世纪战斗模拟游戏介绍
zh.description: 《Half Sword》是一款沉浸式中世纪战斗模拟游戏，让玩家在15世纪的背景下体验真实的剑术技巧与战斗策略。

en.title: Half Sword: An Immersive Medieval Combat Simulation Game Introduction
en.description: Half Sword is an immersive medieval combat simulation game where players experience authentic swordplay and combat strategies in a 15th-century setting.

zh.title: Half Sword游戏评测：中世纪战斗的真实再现
zh.description: 深度评测《Half Sword》的核心特色、物理引擎和游戏体验，探索这款中世纪战斗模拟游戏的真实与乐趣。

en.title: Half Sword Game Review: A True-to-Life Medieval Combat Experience
en.description: An in-depth review of Half Sword's core features, physics engine, and gameplay experience, exploring the authenticity and enjoyment of this medieval combat simulation game.

zh.title: Half Sword游戏攻略：新手指南与高级技巧
zh.description: 全面解析《Half Sword》的基础操作、战斗策略和高级技巧，助您从新手成长为中世纪战斗大师。

en.title: Half Sword Game Guide: Beginner's Handbook and Advanced Techniques
en.description: A comprehensive analysis of Half Sword's basic operations, combat strategies, and advanced techniques to help you evolve from a novice to a medieval combat master.

zh.title: Half Sword开发者专访：幕后故事与未来计划
zh.description: 深入采访《Half Sword》开发团队，揭示游戏开发背后的故事，并探讨未来的更新与发展方向。

en.title: Half Sword Developer Interview: Behind the Scenes and Future Plans
en.description: An in-depth interview with the Half Sword development team, uncovering the stories behind the game's creation and discussing future updates and development directions.

zh.title: Half Sword游戏社区：玩家分享与赛事活动
zh.description: 探索《Half Sword》游戏社区的玩家互动、分享内容以及各类赛事活动，了解如何参与并提升游戏体验。

en.title: Half Sword Game Community: Player Sharing and Events
en.description: Explore the player interactions, shared content, and various events within the Half Sword game community, and learn how to participate and enhance your gaming experience.

zh.title: Half Sword与中世纪历史：游戏中的真实与虚构
zh.description: 探讨《Half Sword》如何再现15世纪的武器、盔甲和战斗风格，以及在游戏设计中对历史真实性与娱乐性的平衡。

en.title: Half Sword and Medieval History: Reality and Fiction in the Game
en.description: Exploring how 'Half Sword' recreates 15th-century weapons, armor, and combat styles, and the balance between historical accuracy and entertainment in game design.
